Package hu.klenium.tetris.view

Class GraphicGameFrame

  • java.lang.Object
    • hu.klenium.tetris.view.GraphicGameFrame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameFrame
    public class GraphicGameFrame
extends Object
implements GameFrame
    Creates and maintains the layout used by a game, responds to events caused by the game's player.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private static Color backgroundColor
      Empty cells' color.
      private int blockSize
      One cell's size.
      private GraphicsContext boardContext
      Context of the canvas used to draw the board.

      The board's size.
      private Scene scene
      The application's scene, used to create and store GUI elements, add event handlers.
      private static Color[] tetrominoColors
      Colors of tetrominoes.
      private GraphicsContext tetrominoContext
      Context of the canvas used to draw the falling tetromino.

        The application's scene, used to create and store GUI elements, add event handlers.

      • tetrominoColors

        private static final Color[] tetrominoColors

        Context of the canvas used to draw the falling tetromino.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GraphicGameFrame

        public GraphicGameFrame​(Scene scene,
                        Dimension gridSize,
                        int blockSize)
        Creates a new frame for a new game in the window. Builds all GUI elements used by the new game, and adds them to the scene.
        Parameters:
        scene - The JavaFX application's scene which is used to build/store new elements.
        gridSize - The board's size (rows/columns).
        blockSize - A board/tetromino cell's size.

    • Method Detail

      • displayBoard

        public void displayBoard​(Board board)
        Called when the board's state is updated and so need to be displayed again.
        Specified by:
        displayBoard in interface GameFrame
        Parameters:
        board - The board to display.

      • displayGameOver

        public void displayGameOver()
        Called when game is stopped: displays the result.
        Specified by:
        displayGameOver in interface GameFrame

      • displayTetromino

        public void displayTetromino​(Tetromino tetromino)
        Called when the falling tetromino's state is updated and so need to be displayed again.
        Specified by:
        displayTetromino in interface GameFrame
        Parameters:
        tetromino - The falling tetromino to display.

      • drawSquare

        private void drawSquare​(GraphicsContext context,
                        Color color,
                        int x,
                        int y)
        Draws a simple filled square to a canvas. Used to draw cells over the board's grid.
        Parameters:
        context - The canvas' context to draw in.
        color - The square's fill color.
        x - X coordinate of the grid.
        y - Y coordinate of the grid.

      • registerEventListeners

        public void registerEventListeners​(TetrisGame game,
                                   Map<KeyCode,Command> keys)
        Adds event handler to the scene. When one of the specificed keys is pressed, sends the corresponding command to game.
        Specified by:
        registerEventListeners in interface GameFrame
        Parameters:
        game - The game which will recieve a command on user input.
        keys - List of keys which are used to control the falling tetromino.
